properties.name: tle.update.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable TLE updates from Space-Track.

properties.name: tle.update.cron
properties.description: Cron expression for scheduled TLE updates.

properties.name: tle.critical.update.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable critical satellite TLE updates.

properties.name: tle.critical.update.cron
properties.description: Cron expression for critical satellite TLE updates.

properties.name: collision.detection.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable collision detection scheduling.

properties.name: collision.detection.cron
properties.description: Cron expression for scheduled collision detection.

properties.name: collision.detection.priority.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable priority collision detection (more frequent checks).

properties.name: collision.detection.priority.cron
properties.description: Cron expression for priority collision detection.
